api_list.name: Get Match Predictions
api_list.description: Returns Head to Head details and predictions for a given match ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betminer.p.rapidapi.com/bm/predictions/match/608749"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betminer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://betminer.p.rapidapi.com/bm/predictions/match/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betminer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
